svg.text: ┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐ │ │ │ P-VALUE DEFINITION: │ │ │ │ The probability of observing a test statistic at least │ │ as extreme as the one calculated, ASSUMING the null │ │ hypothesis is true. │ │ │ │ P(data | H₀ is true) ←── NOT P(H₀ is true | data) │ │ │ └─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘
